content:
INotifyPropertyChanging Interface

In this Article

Notifies clients that a property value is changing.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface INotifyPropertyChanging

Remarks

The INotifyPropertyChanging interface is used to notify clients, typically binding clients, that a property value is changing.

INotifyPropertyChanging is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see Versions and Dependencies.

Events summary

PropertyChanging

Occurs when a property value is changing.

Events

  • PropertyChanging

    Occurs when a property value is changing.

    public event System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangingEventHandler PropertyChanging;
